title: 'We'll find out whether Khamenei was right': Trump reacts to Iran's 'regional war' warning
summary_full: President Trump expressed hope for a deal with Iran, warning that failure could lead to conflict, as Iranian Supreme Leader Khamenei threatened a regional war if provoked. Trump highlighted the US military presence, while Khamenei accused the US of seeking to dominate Iran due to its resources and strategic location, referencing past US influence.
